message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
I'll take a slight edge, but still fair
You took a big chunk, now it's my turn to negotiate!
I'll take a bit more, but I'm willing to compromise
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a chance to back off!
I'll take the majority, it's my last chance
You're really pushing your luck, I'll give you a chance to take it all!
